text: unake rasoolon ne kaho, "kya allaah ke vishay mein sandeh hai, jo aakaashon aur dharatee ka rachayita hai? vah to tumhen isalie bula raha hai, taaki tumhaare gunaahon ko kshama kar de aur tumhen ek niyat samay tak muhall de." unhonne kaha, "tum to bas hamaare hee jaise ek manushy ho, chaahate ho ki hamen unase rok do jinakee pooja hamaare baap-daada karate aae hai. achchha, to ab hamaare saamane koee spasht pramaan le aao.
